# Helicopter Human External Cargo Systems

## Solicitation Summary

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a complete Helicopter Human External Cargo (HEC) system approved by Transport Canada (TC), along with an option for three additional systems and related training.

### Procurement Details

* **Solicitation Number**: M2989-1-0458
* **Publication Date**: July 19, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 25, 2023, at 17:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

### Tender Requirements

To be eligible, submissions must meet the requirements outlined in the RFP and comply with all mandatory technical evaluation criteria. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.

### Contact Information

* **Procurement Office**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police, "E" Division
* **Contact Person**: Amy Wang, Procurement Specialist
* **Email**: [Amy.Wang@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:Amy.Wang@rcmp-grc.gc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (236) 330-3559

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. Additionally, suppliers registered in the Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) will be considered eligible for this procurement.

### Online Resources

All procurement documents are available for download on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).


Indicative UNSPSC codes are 25202500, 46161700, 86101709.

This tender is open to all qualified suppliers, residing in Canada or holding a trade agreement with Canada, eligible to conduct business in Canada.  Goods and services covered by the proposed contract may be supplied from within Canada, but they may also be supplied internationally with a trade agreement with Canada.
